scripts.test:checkout-prod: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && TEST_FILE='checkout-prod' TEST_ENV='Production' TEST_URL='https://lumimeds.com' npx playwright test tests/checkout/checkout-prod.spec.js --project=chromium && node scripts/slack-notify-checkout.js
scripts.test:checkout-staging: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && TEST_FILE='checkout' TEST_ENV='Staging' TEST_URL='https://staging.lumimeds.com' npx playwright test tests/checkout/checkout.spec.js --project=chromium && node scripts/slack-notify-checkout.js
scripts.test:checkout-prod-headed: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && TEST_FILE='checkout-prod' TEST_ENV='Production' TEST_URL='https://lumimeds.com' npx playwright test tests/checkout/checkout-prod.spec.js --project=chromium --headed && node scripts/slack-notify-checkout.js
scripts.test:checkout-prod-record: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs) && RECORD_VIDEO=true TEST_FILE='checkout-prod' TEST_ENV='Production' TEST_URL='https://lumimeds.com' npx playwright test tests/checkout/checkout-prod.spec.js --project=chromium && echo 'âœ… Video saved in test-results folder!'
